meanings.definition: A jump performed on a skateboard or snowboard where the rider and board leap into the air without the use of a ramp or other external force.
meanings.sent1: He practiced his ollies in the skatepark.
meanings.sent2: Skateboarders often start with learning how to do ollies.
meanings.sent3: The ollies of the skater impressed the crowd.
meanings.sent4: Her ollies were like graceful leaps of a dancer.
meanings.sent5: The ollies of the snowboarder were as high as the trees.

meanings.definition: The act of performing an ollie.
meanings.sent1: His ollies showed great skill and control.
meanings.sent2: Watching her ollies was truly impressive.
meanings.sent3: The ollies of the beginners made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: The ollies in the competition were flawless.
meanings.sent5: The ollies of the champion were unmatched in speed and height.

meanings.sent1: The skaters showed off their ollies in the park.
meanings.sent2: The group practiced their synchronized ollies.
meanings.sent3: The ollies of the friends echoed through the skatepark.
meanings.sent4: Their ollies were like a dance routine on skateboards.
meanings.sent5: The ollies of the team were perfectly timed and coordinated.
